articles.content: It's that time of year again! As usual, Game of the Year roundups are flying in thick and fast across the web, and now it's our turn at Pure Xbox to count down our picks for the top ten Xbox Games of… [+3570 chars]

articles.title: Acura Is Offering New Leasing Deals For The 2021 TLX - CarScoops
articles.description: The 2021 Acura TLX can be leased from $339 per month for 36 months.
articles.content:
Acura has announced new lease prices for the 2021 TLX just in time for the holiday season.
The entry-level 2021 Acura TLX 2.0T is currently available for $369/month for 36 months with $3,899 at sign… [+1572 chars]
